name: Time Peel
description:
Theme : One Second

WASD to move reticle, SPACE to move to destination, CTRL to crouch

There's a bug with the NavMesh that occurs randomly, except it is permanently there with the final build

This is the story of a person who accidentally found a watch with time controlling super powers. Turns out, all the gangsters were following him for hunt of the watch. The choice is yours, either run away or fight the enemies.

There's plenty of time to think but not enough to act.
